Class Booking

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Booking
public class Booking extends Object
Represents a booking in the flight booking system.

A Booking contains information about the customer, flight, booking date, seat class, price, seat number, discounts, pet information, and status. It provides methods to manage the booking lifecycle including canceling and completing a booking, as well as formatting booking details.

Author:
ashok

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking(Customer customer, Flight flight, LocalDate bookingDate, Booking.SeatClass seatClass, double price, String seatNumber, double discountPercent, boolean manualDiscount, String petType, double petCharge)
      Constructs a new Booking with the given parameters. Automatically assigns a unique booking ID.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer making the booking
      flight - the flight being booked
      bookingDate - the date when the booking was made
      seatClass - the seat class of the booking
      price - the price of the booking
      seatNumber - the seat number assigned
      discountPercent - discount percentage applied
      manualDiscount - true if discount is manually applied, false otherwise
      petType - type of pet included in the booking (if any)
      petCharge - additional charge for the pet

      public void cancel() throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Cancels this booking and removes the passenger from the flight.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if an error occurs when removing the passenger
